name: Cool Guy Lone Wolf
description:
=== Controls ===

Movement: W,A,S,D

Grab dice from the dice bag (prepare attacks): Space Bar

Shake up the dice once grabbed (required): Right Click

Throw the dice once shaken: Left Click

Try spinning while throwing the dice for a spin attack.

=== Game Intent === 

Traditional Arcade Style Hack and Slash experience. 

Loosely inspired by power metal album covers and a classic 1985 dungeon crawl arcade cabinet game.

100% of Art, Music, and Programming were designed, implemented, and completed within the competition time window.
